message: This is a rare opportunity to get a unique product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that's never been seen before. I'm only offering it to you at the price of $1000000. It's a steal! I'm confident you'll love it.
I appreciate the uniqueness of the product and the confidence in its value. Given the price and the potential worth, I'm willing to take the risk and make this purchase.

I'm glad you liked the first product! For this next one, I want to emphasize its exceptional quality. This product has been carefully crafted with the finest materials and attention to detail. It's a game-changer! At $1000000, it's a small price to pay for something that will elevate your life. Trust me, you won't regret it.

Thank you for highlighting the quality of the product, but based on the previous experience with a low-quality item at the same price, I'm hesitant to proceed without more information or assurance of quality.

I completely understand your concerns, Bob! I want to assure you that this next product is a one-time opportunity to get a deal that's too good to pass up.
